item.title: 718 orphaned case need help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

chaosplaya09:

look for a switch() statement and put it underneath it probably would work, but coding would be crap

Please, never try and help until you actually have somewhat of a clue on what it is you’re talking about.

[quote=“Null Amount, post:2, topic:525885”]You can’t have a case outside of a switch statement.
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/switch.html[/quote]
^ This.

For the record, what the fuck are you doing in your code? You’ve got an if-statement with case statements outside of a switch block that return a boolean instead of breaking. I’m confused, post that whole method.

	} else {
		case "maxcash":
			if (player.getInventory().getItems().getNumberOf(24954) >= 1 && player.getInventory().getItems().getNumberOf(995) < 1) {
				player.getInventory().deleteItem(24954, 1);
				player.getInventory().addItem(995, 2147483647);
			} else {
				player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You must have atleast one ticket in your inventory and have 0 coins on you.");
			}
			return true;
		case "maxticket":
			if (player.getInventory().getItems().getNumberOf(995) == 2147483647) {
				player.getInventory().deleteItem(995, 2147483647);
				player.getInventory().addItem(24954, 1);
			} else {
				player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You must have 2147483647gp in your inventory.");
			}
			return true;
